Battera::

She circled around the pred base. She opened her comlink, "Hey, you 
guys in there. Open up. If I hang out here much longer, the maximals 
will pick me up and I'll be shot out of the sky. I don't want to be 
slag scrap before I can rip open a maximal for revenge. Lower the 
shields or open a window in the shield so I can enter."
